$e=3$ RSA $0<m<N^{1/3}$ $c=m^3\mod N$ $m^3<N$ $N-N^{1/3}<m<N$ $-N^{1/3}<m<0$ $c=m^3\mod N$ $-c\mod N$ $m=-^3\sqrt {-c}$

1.2 ( Wiener )

RSAWiener

1. RSA$N$$d$ $\sqrt 6 (\phi(N)-d)<N^{1/4}$ $(N,e)$ $\log_2N$

RSA$ed\equiv 1\pmod {\phi(N)}$ $e(d-\phi(N))\equiv1\pmod{\phi(N)}$ $D=\phi(N)-d$
$$
eD=-1+k\phi(N)
$$
$k$ $k<D$

$k/D$ $e/N$ $e/N$ $k/D$ $k/D$ $e/ N$ $\phi=(eD+1)/k$ $N$ $k/D=k/D$ $\phi=\phi(N)$ $N$$N$ $d=e^{-1}\pmod {\phi(N)}$ $d=\phi(N)-D$

1.3 ( Boneh & Durfee )

Boneh & Durfee $AM$ $x, y$ $x_0(A+y_0)\equiv1\pmod M$ RSA $e=N^\alpha, a\approx 1,d<N^\sigma$ $f(x,y)=x(N+y)-1$ $x_0,y_0$
$$
f(x_0,y_0)\equiv0\pmod e, |x_0|<X=N^\sigma,|y_0|<Y=3N^{1/2}
$$
$(x_0,y_0)=(k,\phi(N)-N)$ $k$ $ed-k\phi(N)=1$ $\phi(N)$ $d=e^{-1}\pmod{\phi(N)}$ Boneh & Durfee $d<N^{0.292}$

2. RSA $d<N^\sigma$ $d>\phi(N)-N^\sigma$

RSA$ed\equiv 1\pmod {\phi(N)}$ $e(d-\phi(N))\equiv1\pmod{\phi(N)}$
$$
e(d-\phi(N))=1-k\phi(N)
$$
$k$ $\phi(N)=N-s$ $e$
$$
k(N-s)\equiv1\pmod e
$$

$(v_n)$ $n$ $w_j$ $a,c$ $a$ $c$ $w_j$ $v_{n+j}$ $a$

$\Delta$ $w_j$ $v_{n+j}$ $\Delta < p$ $w$ $u$ $\Delta$ - $|w-u|<\Delta$

2.2

1. $p$ $\Delta$ $p>\Delta>1$ $a, c\in F_p $ $a,c$ $v_0,v_1$ $\Delta$- $w_0,w_1$ $v_0$

$\varepsilon_j=v_j-w_j,j=0,1$ $v_1\equiv av_0^2+c\mod p$
$$
w_1+\varepsilon_1-a(w_0+\varepsilon_0)^2-c\equiv0\mod p
$$

$$
A\equiv(w_1-aw_0^2-c)\mod p, \qquad B_1\equiv-2aw_0\Delta\mod p,\
B_2\equiv\Delta\mod p,\qquad C\equiv-a\Delta^2\mod p
$$

$$
A\Delta^2+B_1\Delta\varepsilon_0+B_2\Delta\varepsilon_1+C\varepsilon_0^2\equiv0\mod p
$$

$$
Ax_0+B_1x_1+B_2x_2+Cx_3\equiv0\mod p,\
x_0\equiv0\mod \Delta^2,\
x_1\equiv x_2\equiv0\mod \Delta
$$
$L$ $x=(x_0,x_1,x_2,x_3)\in ZZ^4$

2.3

2. $p$ $\Delta$ $p>\Delta>1$ $a, c\in F_p $ $a$ $v_0,v_1,v_2$ $\Delta$- $w_0,w_1,w_2$ $v_0$

$v_i=w_i+\varepsilon_i,|\varepsilon_i|<\Delta,i=0,1,2$ $av_i^2+c=v_{i+1}\mod p,i=0,1$ $a,w_i$ $\varepsilon_i$
$$
(aw_0^2-w_1-aw_1^2+w_2)+2aw_0\varepsilon_0-\
(1+2aw_1)\varepsilon_1+\varepsilon_2+a(\varepsilon_0^2-\varepsilon_1^2)\equiv 0\mod p
$$
$(1,\varepsilon_0,\varepsilon_1,\varepsilon_2,\varepsilon_0^2-\varepsilon1^2 )$
$$
(aw_0^2-w_1-aw_1^2+w_2)\Delta^2+2aw_0\Delta\Delta\varepsilon_0-(1+2aw_1)\Delta\Delta\varepsilon_1+\
+\Delta\Delta\varepsilon_2+a\Delta^2(\varepsilon_0^2-\varepsilon_1^2)\equiv0\mod p
$$

$$
(aw_0^2-w_1-aw_1^2+w_2)x_0+2aw_0\Delta x_1-(1+2aw_1)\Delta x_2+\
+\Delta x_3+a\Delta^2 x_4\equiv0\mod p,\
x_0\equiv0\pmod \Delta^2,\
x_1,x_2,x_3\equiv0\mod \Delta
$$
$L$ $e=(\Delta^2,\Delta\varepsilon_0,\Delta\varepsilon_1,\Delta\varepsilon_2,\varepsilon_0^2-\varepsilon_1^2)\in ZZ^5$

2.4 &

1 $\Delta=O(p^{1/4})$ 2 $\Delta=O(p^{1/5})$ $\Delta$

$c$ $a$

1.2

$f(x,ym,z)=a_0+a_1x+a_2x^2+a_3y+a_4z+a_5xy+a_6xz+a_7yz$ $(x^0,y^0,z^0)$ $x,y,z$ $X,Y,Z$ $logW$
$$
X^{(7+8\tau+3\tau^2)}(YZ)^{5+\frac{9}{2}\tau}<W^{3+3\tau-\epsilon}
$$
$W=||f(x_1X_n,\dots,x_nX_n)||\infty$ $||f(x_1,\dots,x_n)||{\infty}$ $W$ $x$ $Xx$ $f=2x^2+3x+4$ $X=2$ $||f(x_1X_n,\dots,x_nX_n)||=8x^2+6x+4$ $x^2$ $W=8$

1.3 RSA

1. $\epsilon>0$ , $n$ $N=pq$ $n$ RSA $p,q$ $\frac{n}{2}$ $p-1=2ga,q-1=2gb$ , $g$ $\gamma n$ $0<\gamma<\frac{1}{2}$ $ed\equiv1\mod {2gab}$ , $bitsize(e)=(1-\gamma)n,bitsize(d)=\delta n$ , $0<\delta<(1-\gamma n)$ , $d$
$$
\delta<\frac{1}{4}(4+4\gamma-\sqrt{13+20\gamma+4\gamma^2})-\epsilon
$$
$\log N$


$$
ed=1+k(p-1)b,ed=1+k(q-1)a
$$
$e^2d^2+ed(ka+kb-2)-(N-1)k^2ab-(ka+kb-1)=0$ $f(x,y,z)=e^2x^2+ex(y+z-2)-(y+z-1)z-(N-1)yz$ , $(d,ka,kb)$ , $X=N^\delta,Y=N^{\delta+\frac{1}{2}-\gamma},Z=N^{\delta+\frac{1}{2}-\gamma}$ $W=N^{2+2\gamma-2\delta}$

0x01. Not Wiener

Boneh-Durfee attack,

d = phi - D (D540)

RSA
$$
ed\equiv e(\phi(n)-D)\equiv-eD\equiv1\pmod\phi(n)
$$
mod: $-eD=1+k\phi(n)$

mod e: $-1\equiv k\phi(n)\equiv k(n-s)\pmod e$

$s=p+q-1$kD


$$
f(x,y) = 1+x(n-y)
$$
$f(k,s)\equiv 0\pmod e$(k, s)f copper

0x1.2 Boneh-Durfee

Boneh-DurfeeMultivariate CoppersmithCoppersmithRSA
$$
ed\equiv1\pmod {\phi(n)}
$$

$$
ed=k\phi(n)+1
$$
e:
$$
k\phi(n)+1=0\pmod e
$$
$s = p+q-1$
$$
f(x,y) = 1+x(n-y)
$$
$f(k,s)\equiv 0\pmod e$(k, s)f

$$
